A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautifully shot\, but that is it... plot wise it's a huge mess\, if you have to read books to see where this was heading in a 2\,5h movie where almost no development happens\, then something is bad\, really bad...and still a lot of it just insults any intelligence and logic of the viewer. Lore\, what lore?... This were no twists or taking chances\, it's just poor writting.\n\nRIP
